comment.author: 43472158@N00
comment._content: I am using this slide in an art history class for high school students held at UC Berkeley.  Since I will be using a digital projector, it's great to have high resolution.  Thanks for making it available!

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: First re-use directly from The Commons - awesome!  Thanks for letting us know!  -shelley, manager of information systems, brooklyn museum
